recommended_degree: Bahasa dan Sastra Inggris, Sastra Inggris, Bahasa Inggris, Teknologi Sipil, Teknik Sipil (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Accountability:
a.	Input data into various business systems and databases.
b.	Process all daily orders, break down product information into components and bills of materials.
c.	Provide technical product / order support and guidance to calculate costing for custom products as required.
d.	Provide reports and data upon request to various areas within the business unit.
Qualifications:
a.	Willing to be placed in Majalengka, West Java.
b.	Fluent in English, both written and spoken.
c.	Min.D3 from any major, preferably Architecture / Interior Design.
d.	Experience in order processing will be advantageous.
e.	Proficient in Microsoft Office, PDF editing, or other design tools.
f.	Preferably able to interpret technical drawings, blueprints, and specifications.
